scene_hint.0: The video game interface displays two panels comparing the same piece of equipment.
scene_hint.1: The scene transitions to the game display, showing a game hero using a skill to deal damage to a training dummy.
scene_hint.2: The camera zooms in, slowing down the game hero's shooting action at the training dummy.
scene_hint.3: The screen switches back to the game equipment page, showing multiple different pieces of equipment.
scene_hint.4: The game continues, with the game hero consistently attacking the training dummy.
scene_hint.5: The screen goes black, and the video ends.
